mapper.sql: ID, S_PRODUCT_NAME, S_PROCESS_ID, S_PROCESS_NAME, S_STAGE_NAME, N_OPERATION_STEPS, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME, S_PARA_USE_ID, S_PARA_NAME, S_TABLE_NAME, S_PARA_FIELD, S_GRAPH_TYPE_ID
mapper.select: select * from KANION.KY_PARA_INDEX where S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName} and S_PROCESS_NAME = #{processName} and S_STAGE_NAME = #{stageName} and S_PARA_NAME = #{paraName}

mapper.update:
update KY_PARA_INDEX
S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PROCESS_ID = #{sProcessId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_STAGE_NAME = #{sStageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PARA_USE_ID = #{sParaUseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_PARA_NAME = #{sParaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_TABLE_NAME = #{sTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PARA_FIELD = #{sParaField,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_GRAPH_TYPE_ID = #{sGraphTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update KY_PARA_INDEX set S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PROCESS_ID = #{sProcessId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_STAGE_NAME = #{sStageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PARA_USE_ID = #{sParaUseId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_PARA_NAME = #{sParaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_TABLE_NAME = #{sTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PARA_FIELD = #{sParaField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_GRAPH_TYPE_ID = #{sGraphTypeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
